personalInfo.name: Adnan Khan
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: AccordSecurity
projects.description: developed a comprehensive web application for Accord Security, leveraging Next.js to ensure a fully SEO-optimized and high-performance website. The application includes a role-based authentication system, allowing for secure and efficient management of users, blogs, and job applications via an intuitive admin dashboard.

projects.title: Archiwiz
projects.description: developed a comprehensive web application for Archiwiz, leveraging Next.js to ensure a fully SEO-optimized and high-performance website. The application includes a role-based authentication system, allowing for secure and efficient management of users, blogs, and job applications, project management, and floorplans selling via an intuitive admin dashboard.

keyResponsibilities: Automating manual processes to improve efficiency and reduce errors.
Integration of RESTful APIs to enhance application functionality.
Working with team of developers to create scalable web applications.
worked with team of developers to create scalable web applications.
Implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.

education.degree: Full Stack Web Development with React
education.description: Completed a Coursera specialization that focused on building full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learned best practices for designing and implementing responsive, scalable, and secure web applications.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum in Software Engineering, including courses in Programming, data structures, algorithms, and artificial intelligence. Worked on final year project 'GuardPatrol A guard tracking system' for improving accountability which consisted of a web application for admin to monitor the activities of the guards and a mobile app for guards to scan NFC and submit reports at their designated site's.
